info.description: A Management System for Microservice Compositions
info.title: MICO

url.description: The url to the remote repository to crawl from.
url.title: URL

version.description: The remote release tag. Defaults to 'latest'.
version.title: Version

averageCpuLoad.description: The average CPU load of all pods of one MicoService running on this Node.
averageCpuLoad.title: Average CPU Load

averageMemoryUsage.description: The average memory usage of all pods of one MicoService running on this Node.
averageMemoryUsage.title: Average Memory Usage

hostIp.description: IP address of the host to which the pod is assigned.
hostIp.title: Host IP

nodeName.description: Name of the node the pod is running on.
nodeName.title: Node Name

phase.description: States the lifecycle of a pod: Pending, Running, Succeeded, Failed, Unknown, Completed, CrashLoopBackOff
phase.title: Phase

restarts.description: Counter for restarts of all containers of a pod.
restarts.title: Restarts

startTime.description: The point in time the pod has been started.
startTime.title: Start Time

available.description: Indicates if a pod is available.
available.title: Available

jobs.description: The list of jobs for an application.
jobs.title: List of Jobs

status.description: The aggregated status of jobs for an application.
status.title: Status

contact.description: Human readable contact information for support purposes.
contact.title: Contact

description.description:
Human readable description of this application.
 Is allowed to be empty (default). Null values are skipped.
description.title: Description

name.description: Human readable name of the application.
name.title: Name

owner.description: Human readable information for the application owner, who is responsible for this application.
owner.title: Owner

shortName.description: Unique short name of the application.
shortName.title: Short Name

contact.description: Human readable contact information for support purposes.
contact.title: Contact

deploymentStatus.description: Holds the current deployment status of this application.
deploymentStatus.title: Deployment Status

shortName.title: Short Name

serviceStatuses.description: List of status information of MicoServices, which belong to a MicoApplication.
serviceStatuses.title: Service Status

totalNumberOfAvailableReplicas.description: Number of replicas of all services that are available in a MicoApplication.
totalNumberOfAvailableReplicas.title: Total Number Of Available Replicas

totalNumberOfMicoServices.description: Number of MicoServices of a MicoApplication.
totalNumberOfMicoServices.title: Total Number Of MicoServices

totalNumberOfPods.description: Number of pods created by all MicoServices in a MicoApplication.
totalNumberOfPods.title: Total Number Of Pods

totalNumberOfRequestedReplicas.description: Number of replicas of all services that should be available in a MicoApplication.
totalNumberOfRequestedReplicas.title: Total Number Of Requested Replicas

serviceShortName.title: Service Short Name

serviceVersion.description: The version of the corresponding service.
serviceVersion.title: Service Version

status.description: The current status of the job.
status.title: Job Status

sourceShortName.description: The short name of the source MicoService.
sourceShortName.title: Source Short Name

sourceVersion.description: The version of the source MicoService.
sourceVersion.title: Source Version

targetShortName.description: The short name of the target MicoService.
targetShortName.title: Target Short Name

targetVersion.description: The version of the target MicoService.
targetVersion.title: Target Version

micoServiceDependencyGraphEdgeList.description: The list of edges in the dependency graph based on MicoServiceDependencyGraphEdgeResponseDTO.
micoServiceDependencyGraphEdgeList.title: Edge List

micoServices.description: The MicoServices that are included in the dependency graph.
micoServices.title: Included MicoServices

imagePullPolicy.description:
Indicates whether and when to pull the image.
 Null is ignored.
imagePullPolicy.title: Image Pull Policy

labels.description:
Those labels are key-value pairs that are attached to the deployment of this service. Intended to be used to specify identifying attributes that are meaningful and relevant to users, but do not directly imply semantics to the core system. Labels can be used to organize and to select subsets of objects. Labels can be attached to objects at creation time and subsequently added and modified at any time.
 Each key must be unique for a given object.
 Null is ignored.
labels.title: Labels

replicas.description: Number of desired instances. Defaults to 1.
replicas.title: Replicas

restartPolicy.description:
Restart policy for all containers.
 Null is ignored.
restartPolicy.title: Restart Policy

imagePullPolicy.description:
Indicates whether and when to pull the image.
 Null is ignored.
imagePullPolicy.title: Image Pull Policy

description.description:
Human readable description of this service interface.
 Null values are skipped.
description.title: Description

ports.description:
The list of ports of this interface.
 Must not be empty.
ports.title: Ports

transportProtocol.description: The transport protocol of this interface.
transportProtocol.title: Transport Protocol

description.title: Description

transportProtocol.description: The transport protocol of this interface.

externalIps.description: List of external IP addresses of this MicoServiceInterface.
externalIps.title: External IPs

port.description: The port number of the externally exposed port.
port.title: Exposed Port Number

type.description: The type (protocol) of the port. TCP or UDP.
type.title: Type

contact.title: Contact Information

Human readable description of this service.
 Is allowed to be empty (default). Null values are skipped.
description.title: Description

dockerImageUri.description: The fully qualified URI to the image on DockerHub.
dockerImageUri.title: Docker Image Url

dockerfilePath.description: The relative path to the Dockerfile.
dockerfilePath.title: Path to Dockerfile

gitCloneUrl.description: The URL used for a git clone of a GitHub repository, to clone the current master branch.
gitCloneUrl.title: Git Clone URL

errorMessages.description: Contains error messages for Kubernetes services that are not deployed or not available due to other reasons.
errorMessages.title: Error Messages

interfacesInformation.description: Contains information about the Kubernetes services deployed for each MicoServiceInterface of the corresponding MicoService.
interfacesInformation.title: Interfaces Information

nodeMetrics.description: List of KubernetesNodeMetricsDTO with metrics for each node used by this MicoService.
nodeMetrics.title: Node Metrics
